description: This file defines an 'Intro' page component for a Lightning.js-based quiz application. It sets up layout, styles, and navigation to the quiz page.

classes.name: Component
classes.description: A Lightning.js component that renders the intro page with a title, welcome card, and start button.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Defines the reactive state including layout dimensions, colors, and text content.

methods.name: components
methods.description: Returns the child components used within this component, namely Card and Button.

methods.name: onReady
methods.description: Sets up the button press handler to navigate to the '/quiz' route when pressed.
